thread.title: Paul Scholes: This Manchester United player was a freak
thread.title_full: Paul Scholes: This Manchester United player was a freak

title: Paul Scholes: This Manchester United player was a freak
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Paul Scholes: This Manchester United player was a freak PAUL SCHOLES has called his former Manchester United team-mate Ryan Giggs a freak due to the longevity of his career. PUBLISHED: 07:35, Fri, Feb 17, 2017 | UPDATED: 07:46, Fri, Feb 17, 2017 GETTY Paul Scholes has called Ryan Giggs a freak due to his longevity in the game 
Paul Scholes and Ryan Giggs were both products of Manchester United 's academy from the infamous class of 92. 
The pair racked up over 1500 career appearances for the Red Devils between them, winning everything in the modern game. 
However, Giggs played one more year with the club following Scholes' retirement, and the former midfielder has branded the Welshman "a freak" for doing so. GETTY Paul Scholes and Ryan Giggs were both products of Manchester United's class of 92 
"I played with some brilliant players, so many brilliant players," Scholes told website RepublikofMancunia . 
"But Ryan [Giggs] was the one that could lift everything. 
"Youâ€™d just give him the ball, especially on big European nights here, he used to beat five or six men, used to get the crowd going. Manchester United player ratings against Saint-Etienne in Europa League Thu, February 16, 2017
